resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104941</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104941</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206522</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">History in the Raw</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschichte im rohen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Histoire dans le cru</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">History no cru</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Storia nel grezzo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ιστορία στον ακατέργαστο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Historia en el sin procesar</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">discusses the importance of primary documents and uses them to illustrate historical concepts such as the subjective nature of written history, the intimate view of historical people's lives that primary documents can provide, and the importance of developing analytical skills when reconstructing history.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">behandelt den Wert der Primärdokumente und 
benutzt sie, um historische Konzepte wie die subjektive Natur der 
schriftlichen Geschichte, der vertrauten Ansicht der Leben der 
historischen Leute, die Primärdokumente voraussetzen können, und des
Wertes des Entwickelns der analytischen Fähigkeiten zu 
veranschaulichen, wenn, Geschichte wieder aufbauend.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">discute l'importance des documents primaires et 
les emploie pour illustrer des concepts historiques tels que la nature
subjective de l'histoire écrite, de la vue intime des vies des 
personnes historiques que les documents primaires peuvent fournir, et 
de l'importance de développer des qualifications analytiques en 
reconstruisant l'histoire.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">discute a importância de originais preliminares e
usa-os ilustrar conceitos históricos tais como a natureza subjetiva 
do history escrito, da vista intimate das vidas do pessoa histórico 
que os originais preliminares podem fornecer, e da importância de 
desenvolver habilidades analíticas ao reconstructing o history.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">discute l'importanza dei documenti primari e li 
usa per illustrare i concetti storici quale la natura soggettiva di 
storia scritta, della vista intima delle vite della gente storica che 
i documenti primari possono assicurare e dell'importanza di sviluppare
le abilità analitiche quando ricostruiscono la storia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">συζητά τη σημασία των αρχικών εγγράφων και τους 
χρησιμοποιεί για να επεξηγήσει τις ιστορικές έννοιες όπως η 
υποκειμενική φύση της γραπτής ιστορίας, η οικεία όψη των ζωών 
των ιστορικών ανθρώπων που τα αρχικά έγγραφα μπορούν να 
παρέχουν, και η σημασία τις αναλυτικές δεξιότητες κατά τον 
αναδημιουργία της ιστορίας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">discute la importancia de documentos primarios y 
los utiliza para ilustrar conceptos históricos tales como la 
naturaleza subjetiva de la historia escrita, de la vista íntima 
de las vidas de la gente histórica a que los documentos primarios 
pueden proporcionar, y de la importancia de desarrollar habilidades 
analíticas al reconstruir historia.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206522</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104941</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/history-in-the-raw</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
